arguments.description: The first x coordinate of triangle vector.
arguments.name: x1

arguments.description: The first y coordinate of triangle vector.
arguments.name: y1

arguments.description: The second x coordinate of triangle vector.
arguments.name: x2

arguments.description: The second y coordinate of triangle vector.
arguments.name: y2

arguments.description: The third x coordinate of triangle vector.
arguments.name: x3

arguments.description: The third y coordinate of triangle vector.
arguments.name: y3

arguments.description: (false/nil) The triangle will be filled, (true) The triangle will have only lines (outline).
arguments.name: l

arguments.description: The color of triangle (0-15), defaults to the active color.
arguments.name: c

notes: The arguments can be passed in a table
shortDescription: Draws a triangle on the screen.
